name: Energy Booster
description: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
additionalInfo: No longer builds into Arcane Boots as of version 7.35
Now builds into Pavise as of version 7.35
No longer builds into Holy Locket as of version 7.33
Gold cost reduced from 900 to 800 in version 7.29
